hook.text: Nurses, therapists, and social workers feel it first: caring too much, too long, until caring hurts.

buildup.text: Empathy fatigue occurs when emotional empathy is constantly activated without recovery. The well runs dry.

discovery.text: Compassion is sustainable. Empathy alone is not. Compassion adds action; empathy without boundaries just absorbs.

twist.text: Protecting yourself from empathy fatigue isn't selfish. It's necessary to keep helping others long-term.

climax.text: Set emotional boundaries. Recharge deliberately. Shift from absorbing pain to actively offering support.

punchline.text: Care deeply but protect yourself. Empathy needs refueling.

quiz.question: What's the difference between empathy and compassion regarding burnout?
options: Compassion adds action and is more sustainable than empathy alone
